If your think we should display your game you need to have submitted it to hackclub. 

If it is approved and appears on https://sprig.hackclub.com/ tell us your author name with a "New Author" issue.

If it isn't approved for inclusion on https://sprig.hackclub.com/ we can still add it here. Fill in as many of these as you can to help us add your game.
